required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome Injection in Subjects With Advanced Bone and Soft Tissue Sarcoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Open-label, Phase Ib Study of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome Injection in Subjects With Advanced Bone and Soft Tissue Sarcoma Who Has Failed At Least One Prior Line of Therapy

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multicenter, open-label, phase Ib study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome in subjects with unresectable or metastatic bone and soft tissue sarcoma who has failed at least one prior line of therapy.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a multicenter, open-label, phase Ib study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome in subjects with unresectable or metastatic bone and soft tissue sarcoma who has failed at least one prior line of therapy. About 50 subjects will be recruited in this study. The subjects will receive Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome 20 mg/m2 by an intravenous infusion (IV), every 21 days (q3w, 1 cycle). All the subjects will receive the treatment until disease progression, intolerable toxicity, death, or withdrawal by investigator or subject decision (a maximum of 6 cycles).

primary_outcome.time_frame: From the initiation of the first dose to 28 days after the last dose

clinical_study.condition: Unresectable or Metastatic Bone and Soft Tissue Sarcoma

arm_group.description: Subjects with unresectable or metastatic bone and soft tissue sarcoma will receive 20 mg/m2 Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Liposome injection every 21 days (a cycle) for a maximum of 6 cycles.

intervention.description: 20 mg/m2, IV, on day 1 of each 21-day cycle (q3w).
